# define the tests themselves:

add_executable(sockets-test-echo-tcp-client EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL
        "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/test/echo-tcp-client/main.cpp"
)
target_link_libraries(sockets-test-echo-tcp-client
    sal
    core-util

)
yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE sockets-test-echo-tcp-client)
add_test(sockets-test-echo-tcp-client sockets-test-echo-tcp-client)
add_dependencies(all_tests sockets-test-echo-tcp-client)
